Reviews.Title: Lasted just over 1 year.
Reviews.Author: Vadim Romanovich
Reviews.Content: For the price, not too bad.  However the keyboard always gave a tough time getting the "a" key pressed since it is so close to the edge of the display.  Most of the time, I would type "s" instead.  I tried running the "calibrate screen" in the setup with no noticeable improvement.  To make things worse, after ~15 month of use, the back button stopped working... actually rather the screen got completely off.  Pressing the back button is actually pressing the bottom of the screen.  So calibration is way off now.  Tried to re calibrate with no success.  Still way off.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Cell Tek
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Resistive touch screen, which requires a lot of pressure. But other than that not bad. Full android capabilities. Compact and economical.

Reviews.Title: No cumple las espectativas
Reviews.Author: Mariela
Reviews.Content: Este telefono no posee flash de la camara tal como lo ofrecen. Es dificil el uso de la pantalla, hay que apretar muy fuerte para mover los iconos. Es complicado para conectarse a internet. NO LO RECOMIENDO

Reviews.Title: i like it, its a good phone
Reviews.Author: Bman
Reviews.Content: I like this phone its really good and is not in bad condition. I just wish that it came with more than one screen protector.
